fulltext: oai:clarin-pl.eu:11321/38;2016-01-21T14:27:43Z;hdl_11321_3;hdl_11321_4;WordnetLoom;Piasecki, Maciej;Marcińczuk, Michał;Ramocki, Radosław;Maziarz, Marek;Radziszewski, Adam;Wardyński, Adam;Kędzia, Paweł;Naskręt, Tomasz;WordnetLoom – is an wordnet editor application built for the needs of the construction of a the largest Polish wordnet called plWordNet. WordnetLoom provides two means of interaction: a form-based, implemented initially, and a visual, graph-based introduced recently. The visual, graph-based interactive presentation of the wordnet structure enables browsing and its direct editing on the structure of lexico-semantic relations and synsets. WordnetLooms works in a distributed environment, i.e. several linguists can work simulanuously from different sites on the same central database.;2011-04-20;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11321/38;pol;downloadable_files_count: 0;Wrocław University of Technology;http://nlp.pwr.wroc.pl/pl/narzedzia-i-zasoby/wordnetloom
name: c21ffa6a-da40-55e3-a854-2046fa960567
notes: WordnetLoom – is an wordnet editor application built for the needs of the construction of a the largest Polish wordnet called plWordNet. WordnetLoom provides two means of interaction: a form-based, implemented initially, and a visual, graph-based introduced recently. The visual, graph-based interactive presentation of the wordnet structure enables browsing and its direct editing on the structure of lexico-semantic relations and synsets. WordnetLooms works in a distributed environment, i.e. several linguists can work simulanuously from different sites on the same central database.
title: WordnetLoom
